title: Spotify for Unsupported Countries_smearcampaigner
description:
Spotify for Unsupported Countries

Installation Steps and Instructions :
1. Download and Install OpenVPN from 
  <a href=" https://openvpn.net/index.php/open-source/downloads.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> https://openvpn.net/index.php/open-source/downloads.html</a>
	
   Choose either 32 or 64 Bit

2. Extract 'OpenVPN-Certificate-Bundle-Dec2013' and Paste the Certificate Bundle files to the following folder:
   	
        If on 64 Bit:	
		C:Program FilesOpenVPNconfig
	If on 32 Bit:
		C:Program Files (x86)OpenVPNconfig

3. Run OpenVPN GUI (It should be running on your system tray)

	3.1 Right click OpenVPN and use any configuration to connect 
           (TCP80 tested working)

	3.1 Use 
		username: freevpnme
		password: kb6Tn8

	SOURCE: freevpn.me
	*If username and password are not working, check freevpn.me if they have changed the credentials
	*If connection keeps on resetting:
		Run services.msc
		Check properties of 'Network Connections' and change 'Startup type' to 'Automatic'

	If successful OpenVPN will pop up a message that you've been 
        assigned with a new IP hopefully a country which supports Spotify, 
        haven't encountered an IP of unsupported country so far.

4. Create an account on Spotify website giving a fake address (anywhere in the US, use Googe Map)

5. Download and Install official Spotify app from 

   <a href=" http://download.spotify.com/Spotify%20Installer.exe" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://download.spotify.com/Spotify%20Installer.exe</a>


I DID NOT CREATE ANY OF THE ABOVE TOOLS/APPS, I JUST FIGURE OUT THE STEPS.
CREDIT TO THE RESPECTIVE OWNERS.
